release_notes: Initial public release of the e-commerce platform.
change_logs: Core shopping flow, user authentication, basic checkout enabled.
feature_updates: Product browsing, cart creation, standard checkout.

release_notes: Minor performance improvements and UI fixes.
change_logs: Optimized search queries, fixed UI glitches on mobile.
feature_updates: Faster search results, smoother product listing.

change_logs: Updated payment gateway, improved error handling.
feature_updates: More reliable payments, better failure messages.

release_notes: Major update introducing order tracking and refunds.
change_logs: Added order tracking module, integrated refund workflows.
feature_updates: Real-time order tracking, refund request support.

change_logs: Fixed crashes during checkout, optimized cart handling.
feature_updates: Improved app stability, fewer cart-related issues.

change_logs: Refactored search ranking logic, updated recommendation engine.
feature_updates: More relevant search results, personalized recommendations.
